This project is a Next.js AI camera event detector app using shadcn/ui for all components (fallback to Tailwind if not available), supports dark and light mode, includes a theme changer integrated with https://tweakcn.com/editor/theme#, and allows importing themes like npx shadcn@latest add https://tweakcn.com/r/themes/amethyst-haze.json. Use heroicons for icons.
